QuestData.Title: WANTED: Krojek the Shoreprowler
QuestData.Description:
We've been watching the great shark we know as Krojek for many years now, waiting for the best time to hunt him down.
His hunting ground has meandered closer and closer to the shore. That means the time is now. Gather your hunting party and take him out!
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: Once a staple to the local ecosystem, the Shoreprowler has taken his hunting grounds too close to Iskaara.
QuestData.RewardText: It is the cycle of the sea life out here. Some we leave to continue the line. Some we cull, some we eat. All in balance.
